Literature.Title: Characterization of a novel antimicrobial peptide with chitin-biding domain from Mytilus coruscus.
Literature.Author: Qin CL, Huang W, Zhou SQ, Wang XC, Liu HH, Fan MH, Wang RX, Gao P, Liao Z

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli CGMCC 1.1583(MIC=>100µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus CGMCC 1.1616(MIC=100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CGMCC 1.0102(MIC=100µM),Vibrio harveyi CGMCC 1.1601(MIC=>100µM),Bacillus subtilis CGMCC 1.1630(MIC=3.13µM),Staphylococcus aureus CGMCC 1.128(MIC=6.25µM),Micrococcus luteus CGMCC 28001(MIC=3.13µM),Bacillus megaterium CGMCC 1.1487(MIC=6.25µM),Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2086(MIC=12.5µM),Candida albicans CMCC 98001(MIC=25.0µM)
